If you start a new game all of your progress will be lost !!! Are you sure you want to do that ?
This game consist in touching the button at the right moment, in the right way, based on certain criteria !!! You have to solve the specific task of every level. Turn the page for more details !!!
The task that you will have to solve are based on different gestures that you will do on the buttons at a specific time: PRESS RELEASE CLICK DOUBLE_CLICK

One of the criteria of touching the button is its color. The color that you can see are RED, GREEN, BLUE and YELLOW. Be careful ! Sometimes, some colors can appear several times per turn. It is possible that you will need to do different actions each time the color pops up !!!

The time will also be very important in order to complete the levels. All colors will be visible a certain period of time and sometimes you will have to do special gestures after a specific period of time that is mentioned in the task !
